name: Retard Gang
description:
Retard Gang is a 2D Platformer/Side Scroller Adventure game and Infinite Runner, an inside joke within Heavenly Realm's Discord server. Each character has their own level. I may possibly add new content in future updates as well as new characters. 

This is a simple game in which I could test some new features in softwares like Construct 2 and Android Studio.

If you wish to have the .capx for Construct 2 engine studying purposes, feel free to contact me.
